mapper.update: UPDATE TB_Persn SET PersnNm = #{persnNm}, BirthDate = #{birthDate}, BirthYear = #{birthYear}, BirthMonth = #{birthMonth}, BirthDay = #{birthDay}, Sex = #{sex}, Phone = #{phone}, Tel = #{tel}, Email = #{email}, Zip = #{zip}, RoadAddr1 = #{roadAddr1}, RoadAddr2 = #{roadAddr2}, StretAddr1 = #{stretAddr1}, StretAddr2 = #{stretAddr2}, Educt = #{educt}, Job = #{job}, ScholNm = #{scholNm}, ScholMajor = #{scholMajor}, ScholGrade = #{scholGrade}, JobNm = #{jobNm}, JobDuty = #{jobDuty}, UptId = #{uptId}, UptDt = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') WHERE PersnId = #{persnId}
